metadata.title: CVE-2019-25059 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Artifex Ghostscript through 9.26 mishandles .completefont. NOTE: this issueexists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2019-3839.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-25059` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5
ghostscript-x - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5
libgs9 - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5
libgs9-common - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5').
